title: Kuali Conversations 1
author: Kueh Wee Rock
summary: Driven, ambitious and proactive, he not only engaged in scholarly pursuits at Imperial but also used his time in university to explore several interests outside of academia, including starting a business.

title: Going off the deep end
author: Kueh Wee Rock
summary: In university, there is an absence of short term goals. You know you have to do something, but what?

title: Relentless optimism
author: Chan Jun Shern
summary: In psychology class, they teach you about self-fulfilling prophecies. The part they usually leave out? You can use it as a tool.
